steps.title: Click on a link for a free Microsoft Access trial for the most recent version of the software.
steps.content: Click on a link for a free Microsoft Access trial for the most recent version of the software.

steps.title: Click on the green download button in the top left of the site.
steps.content: Click on the green download button in the top left of the site.

steps.title: Hit "Continue to Download" in the next screen,which will take you to Microsoft's site.
steps.content: Hit "Continue to Download" in the next screen,which will take you to Microsoft's site.

steps.title: Click "Try 1 Month Free" to download Office Professional on a trial basis.
steps.content: Click "Try 1 Month Free" to download Office Professional on a trial basis. This contains Microsoft Access.
